htmlContent: All of the player’s Coup attempts in Central and South America are +1 for the remainder of the turn, while all opponent’s Coup attempts are -1 for the remainder of the turn.
name: Latin American Death Squads
plainContent: All of the player’s Coup attempts in Central and South America are +1 for the remainder of the turn, while all opponent’s Coup attempts are -1 for the remainder of the turn.
